revised_title: Investigations into Diatomic Bases and Diphosphonium-Compounds
tldr: The author explores the formation of diatomic bases and diphosphonium compounds through the reaction of ammonia and its homologues with dibromide of ethylene. The study focuses on the phosphorus series, where triethylphosphine exhibits distinct characteristics and provides a clearer understanding of the relations between monatomic and diatomic bases.
